item.description:
Our favorite herbologist, Patricia, will be coming to help us learn about medicinal teas that we can grow in our yards!  She will also help us learn how to come to an understanding with the herbs so that we can better determine which one to use for what purpose and which person!  A unique opportunity indeed as it will be an opportunity to learn what cannot be taught from a book!

As always, please bring a dish that can serve four people and be ready for great company, good food and a meaningful experience!

Please also know that people attend who are not in Meetup, so there are always more than those who RSVP.
item.name: tasting medicinal teas
